Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Star(s): Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
Summary: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

Name: The Godfather
Star(s): Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
Summary: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

Name: The Dark Knight
Star(s): Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
Summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Name: Schindler's List
Star(s): Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall
Summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Star(s): Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
Summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Name: 12 Angry Men
Star(s): Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam, John Fiedler
Summary: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Name: The Godfather Part II
Star(s): Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton
Summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Name: Pulp Fiction
Star(s): John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis
Summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Name: Fight Club
Star(s): Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
Summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Name: Inception
Star(s): Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon
Summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Star(s): Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
Summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Name: Forrest Gump
Star(s): Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
Summary: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Star(s): Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffr
Summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Star(s): Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom
Summary: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Name: Jai Bhim
Star(s): Suriya, Lijo Mol Jose, Manikandan K., Rajisha Vijayan
Summary: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

Name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Director(s): Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
Star(s): Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Velez
Summary: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Name: Interstellar
Star(s): Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Mackenzie Foy
Summary: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Name: Goodfellas
Star(s): Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
Summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Name: The Matrix
Star(s): Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie
Summary: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Star(s): Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman, Peter Brocco
Summary: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Star(s): Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
Summary: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Name: The Silence of the Lambs
Star(s): Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn, Ted Levine
Summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Name: Se7en
Star(s): Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker
Summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Name: Saving Private Ryan
Star(s): Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns
Summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Star(s): Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
Summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Name: The Green Mile
Star(s): Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt
Summary: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

Name: Spirited Away
Star(s): Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi
Summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

Name: City of God
Star(s): Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Matheus Nachtergaele, Phellipe Haagensen
Summary: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Star(s): Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
Summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Name: Life Is Beautiful
Star(s): Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
Summary: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Star(s): James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
Summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Seven Samurai
Star(s): Toshir
Summary: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

Name: Harakiri
Star(s): Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Ishihama, Shima Iwashita, Tetsur
Summary: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Name: Oppenheimer
Star(s): Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon, Robert Downey Jr.
Summary: The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

Name: The Departed
Star(s): Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
Summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Name: Back to the Future
Star(s): Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
Summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Name: Gladiator
Star(s): Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
Summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Name: Alien
Star(s): Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright
Summary: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

Name: Parasite
Star(s): Song Kang
Summary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

Name: The Prestige
Star(s): Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine
Summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Name: Django Unchained
Star(s): Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
Summary: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Name: Psycho
Star(s): Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin
Summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Name: Whiplash
Star(s): Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist, Paul Reiser
Summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Name: Léon: The Professional
Star(s): Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
Summary: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Name: The Pianist
Star(s): Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
Summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Name: The Usual Suspects
Star(s): Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin
Summary: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

Name: The Lion King
Star(s): Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
Summary: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Name: American History X
Star(s): Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D
Summary: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.

Name: The Intouchables
Star(s): Fran
Summary: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Name: Casablanca
Star(s): Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
Summary: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Name: Once Upon a Time in the West
Star(s): Henry Fonda, Charles Bronson, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards
Summary: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Name: Grave of the Fireflies
Star(s): Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi, Yoshiko Shinohara
Summary: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Name: Rear Window
Star(s): James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
Summary: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

Name: Cinema Paradiso
Star(s): Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili, Isa Danieli
Summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

Name: Modern Times
Star(s): Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
Summary: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Name: City Lights
Star(s): Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
Summary: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Name: The Shining
Star(s): Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
Summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Name: Joker
Star(s): Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
Summary: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

Name: Avengers: Endgame
Star(s): Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Summary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

Name: Inglourious Basterds
Star(s): Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, M
Summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Name: Apocalypse Now
Star(s): Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest
Summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director(s): Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star(s): Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Coco
Star(s): Anthony Gonzalez, Gael Garc
Summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Name: Come and See
Star(s): Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Liubomiras Laucevicius, Vladas Bagdonas
Summary: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Name: Oldboy
Star(s): Choi Min
Summary: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

Name: Aliens
Star(s): Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser
Summary: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Name: The Dark Knight Rises
Star(s): Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman
Summary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Name: Memento
Star(s): Guy Pearce, Carrie
Summary: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Star(s): Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys
Summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

Name: Avengers: Infinity War
Star(s): Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
Summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Name: Amadeus
Star(s): F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice
Summary: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Name: Your Name.
Star(s): Ryunosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryo Narita, Aoi Y
Summary: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

Name: 3 Idiots
Star(s): Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh, Sharman Joshi
Summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Name: WALL·E
Star(s): Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
Summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Name: The Lives of Others
Star(s): Ulrich M
Summary: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Star(s): Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn
Summary: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Name: Capernaum
Star(s): Zain Al Rafeea, Yordanos Shiferaw, Boluwatife Treasure Bankole, Kawsar Al Haddad
Summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

Name: Das Boot
Star(s): J
Summary: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

Name: Sunset Blvd.
Star(s): William Holden, Gloria Swanson, Erich von Stroheim, Nancy Olson
Summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Name: The Great Dictator
Star(s): Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner
Summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Name: Paths of Glory
Star(s): Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou, George Macready
Summary: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Name: Witness for the Prosecution
Star(s): Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Laughton, Elsa Lanchester
Summary: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Name: High and Low
Star(s): Toshir
Summary: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

Name: Top Gun: Maverick
Star(s): Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer
Summary: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

Name: Heat
Star(s): Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight
Summary: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

Name: American Beauty
Star(s): Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley
Summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Name: Good Will Hunting
Star(s): Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsg
Summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Name: Scarface
Star(s): Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Summary: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

Name: Requiem for a Dream
Star(s): Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
Summary: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Name: A Clockwork Orange
Star(s): Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke
Summary: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Name: Once Upon a Time in America
Star(s): Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams
Summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Star(s): Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne
Summary: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

Name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Star(s): Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter
Summary: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

Name: Braveheart
Star(s): Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen
Summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Name: The Hunt
Star(s): Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp, Lasse Fogelstr
Summary: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

Name: Reservoir Dogs
Star(s): Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
Summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Name: Toy Story
Star(s): Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
Summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Name: Full Metal Jacket
Star(s): Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey, Vincent D
Summary: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Name: Hamilton
Star(s): Lin
Summary: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Name: Incendies
Star(s): Lubna Azabal, M
Summary: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

Name: Up
Star(s): Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
Summary: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

Name: Lawrence of Arabia
Star(s): Peter O
Summary: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Star(s): Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
Summary: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Name: Amélie
Star(s): Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta
Summary: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

Name: Vertigo
Star(s): James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore
Summary: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

Name: Princess Mononoke
Star(s): Y
Summary: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Name: Toy Story 3
Star(s): Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
Summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

Name: Citizen Kane
Star(s): Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore, Agnes Moorehead
Summary: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Name: North by Northwest
Star(s): Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis
Summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

Name: Metropolis
Star(s): Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel, Gustav Fr
Summary: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Name: To Kill a Mockingbird
Star(s): Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy
Summary: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

Name: Singin' in the Rain
Star(s): Gene Kelly, Donald O
Summary: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

Name: M
Star(s): Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann, Inge Landgut, Otto Wernicke
Summary: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Name: The Sting
Star(s): Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning
Summary: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Name: The Apartment
Star(s): Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston
Summary: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Name: A Separation
Star(s): Payman Maadi, Leila Hatami, Sareh Bayat, Shahab Hosseini
Summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Name: Bicycle Thieves
Star(s): Lamberto Maggiorani, Enzo Staiola, Lianella Carell, Elena Altieri
Summary: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

Name: Ikiru
Star(s): Takashi Shimura, Nobuo Kaneko, Shin
Summary: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Name: Judgment at Nuremberg
Star(s): Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark, Marlene Dietrich
Summary: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

Name: Double Indemnity
Star(s): Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson, Byron Barr
Summary: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

Name: Like Stars on Earth
Star(s): Darsheel Safary, Aamir Khan, Tanay Chheda, Sachet Engineer
Summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

Name: Dangal
Star(s): Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
Summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Name: The Wolf of Wall Street
Star(s): Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
Summary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Name: The Thing
Star(s): Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David, Richard Masur
Summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Star(s): Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
Summary: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Name: Taxi Driver
Star(s): Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd, Albert Brooks
Summary: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Name: Shutter Island
Star(s): Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley
Summary: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

Name: Jurassic Park
Star(s): Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
Summary: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

Name: No Country for Old Men
Star(s): Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
Summary: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Name: The Sixth Sense
Star(s): Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette, Olivia Williams
Summary: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

Name: There Will Be Blood
Star(s): Daniel Day
Summary: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Name: Snatch
Star(s): Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Stephen Graham, Vinnie Jones
Summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Name: Casino
Star(s): Robert De Niro, Sharon Stone, Joe Pesci, James Woods
Summary: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a casino executive and a mafia enforcer - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

Name: Batman Begins
Star(s): Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson
Summary: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

Name: The Truman Show
Star(s): Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich
Summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

Name: The Great Escape
Star(s): Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
Summary: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Name: V for Vendetta
Star(s): Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves, Stephen Rea
Summary: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
Star(s): Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah, Michael Madsen
Summary: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

Name: Green Book
Star(s): Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini, Sebastian Maniscalco
Summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

Name: Howl's Moving Castle
Star(s): Chieko Baish
Summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Name: Die Hard
Star(s): Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson
Summary: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Name: A Beautiful Mind
Star(s): Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer
Summary: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

Star(s): Dean
Summary: April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

Name: Pan's Labyrinth
Star(s): Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi L
Summary: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

Name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Star(s): Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott
Summary: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

Name: Finding Nemo
Star(s): Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
Summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Name: L.A. Confidential
Star(s): Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger
Summary: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Name: Gone with the Wind
Director(s): Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood
Star(s): Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O
Summary: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Name: Downfall
Star(s): Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Ulrich Matthes, Juliane K
Summary: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

Name: The Father
Star(s): Anthony Hopkins, Olivia Colman, Mark Gatiss, Olivia Williams
Summary: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.
